Latest Projects

Explore some of our most recent and impactful projects, showcasing our expertise in delivering innovative solutions across various industries.

Pharmacy ERP System

Pharmacy provides trusted healthcare solutions, offering quality medicines and personalized customer care. We are committed to ensuring health, convenience, and reliability for every customer.

ERP System

The ERP System Project is an Oracle APEXbased application built to streamline and digitize business processes. It enhances efficiency, accuracy, and overall organizational productivity

Global Marketing Dashboard

An interactive dashboard designed for sales and marketing analytics, providing real-time insights into performance metrics. It helps teams track trends, optimize strategies, and drive growth

Feeder Management System

The Feeder Management System is a technology-driven solution that automates and optimizes feeding operations. It ensures efficiency, reduces waste, and improves overall productivity..

Strategic Dashboard

The Strategic Dashboard is a business intelligence tool that delivers real-time KPI insights through interactive visualizations, helping leaders make quick, informed decisions.

Baazar Market App

A digital marketplace that connects buyers and sellers with secure payments, real-time order tracking, and vendor management tools for a seamless shopping experience.
